intro: Rosa rubiginosa f. rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leaved dog玫瑰, is a compact shrub native to the Mediterranean region. It is characterized by its rounded, leathery leaves and clusters of fragrant, pale pink to reddish flowers. The plant produces oval, red-brown fruits that contain numerous seeds. It is well adapted to dry, rocky soils and thrives in full sun. This cultivar is often appreciated for its ornamental value and hardiness in coastal and arid environments.
